name: So, We Need You to Work on Saturday
name_original: So, We Need You to Work on Saturday
description:
STORY

It's Friday afternoon, almost time to leave work, which means your boss is about to ask you to work this weekend. Time to finish up your tasks and escape before he catches up to you. 

HOW TO WIN

Seek out listed items (TPS report, watering can, etc) and use them on the appropriate thing/person without the MANAGER catching up to you.

CONTROLS

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

Left Mouse Button [LMB] - Interact

Escape button - Pause

Left Control - Crouch

Left Shift - Sprint

Walkthrough (+rambling commentary) : Work On Saturday Walkthrough and Commentary - YouTube
